Known IssuesÂ¶

  • When sending requests with a Range header, Dugong may be unable to parse the server response. This happens if the server sends multipart/byteranges data without a Content-Length header. This is allowed by RFC 2616, because the content length is implicit in the multipart body, but Dugong does not yet support parsing the body.
